sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SET, or Sets, a term used by the farmers and gardeners to express the young plants of the white thorn and other shrubs, with which they used to raise their quick or quick- set hedges. The white thorn is the best of all trees for this purpose ; and, under proper regulations, its sets seldom fail to answer the farmerâ€™s utmost expectations.
